Headline: #29 State Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/Illinois
ShortDescription: NB 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Dearborn, Chicago, and Fairbanks due to, street blockage near State/Illinois.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State buses are temporarily rerouted via State, Hubbard, Dearborn, Chicago, and Fairbanks due to, street blockage near State/Illinois.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
